entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect date format in Windows 10 and Windows 11 #60845
  • Why do I have to deploy the "runtimes" folder on a box with dotnet runtime installed? #60844
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokenRegistration.OnUnregisteredWithoutInvoke(Action) #60843
  • Broken Link to .NET Forums #60837
  • ETW event Method/LoadVerbose contains wrong method signature for methods receiving function pointer (C#9) #60829
  • JIT ARM32: Assertion failed 'size == EA_4BYTE' during 'Generate code' #60827
  • Infrastructure - Rollout (November 2021) #60826
    7.0.0
  • [Linux][arm] System.Memory.Tests failed with SIGSEGV on rolling build #60825
  • Native dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly - Issue when try use a callback from C++ #60824
  • Test failure System.Drawing.Tests.IconTests.Save_OutputStream_Success(fileName: \"96x96_one_entry_8bit.ico\") #60823
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/hfa/main/testE/hfa_nd2E_d/hfa_nd2E_d.sh #60821
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M13-RTM/b98958/b98958/b98958.sh #60820
  • Test failure Color.RedirectedOutputDoesNotUseAnsiSequences #60819
  • [API Proposal]: QuicConnection.CancelPendingAcceptStream #60818

Closed

  • Intercept the function calls at runtime #60243
    7.0.0
  • CMake and `Send-VSDevShellTelemetry` both failing during build #60838
  • [API Proposal]: Add *Try*ResolveLinkTarget to FileSystemInfo #56256
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonExtensionData] on a property of type JsonObject generates invalid JSON when serializing #60806
  • NotSupportedException at at System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC.HashFinal() #59289
    Future
  • Enhancement for "Seal internal/private types" #60830
  • Support for EnumMemberAttribute in JsonConverterEnum #31081
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() #60531
    7.0.0
  • Add new ObjectDisposedException constructor overload #51700
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • Setting nullable properties and removing null forgiving operator from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop flagging methods with well-known unsupported types for conversion #60841
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • DateTimeMaskTest depends on the region configuration of the machine #60840
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add a micro optimization to fill_runtime_generic_context (). #60839
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Disable DllImportGenerator tests on s390x #60833
    area-System.Net
  • Change code generation strategy for ILEmitResolverBuilder #60831
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactor Regex FindFirstChar #60822
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use SDK's .NETFramework refpack version #60555
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip more failing DllImport tests #60836
  • Initial support for partially jitted methods #60791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the antigen summarize bug #60834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't trim PNSE assemblies and enable trimming for inbox assets on all .NETCoreApp versions #58345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Swap using the provided indexes #55331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Reorganize the creation of the initlocals bblock. #60804
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Array functions used by MD arrays as intrinsics #60816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Properly use result value for dump IPC cmd #60726
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Additional trimming for EventSource.IsSupported feature switch #56564
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-System.Drawing
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Question: Data()/gtOp2 for GT_OBJ ? #1673
  • Drive ILC Trim Analysis warnings for "Hello world" to zero #396
  • Port `--make-repro-path` feature from crossgen2 #1573

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Struct padding on the shadow stack #1677
  • Switch to R&D 1ES pools #1678

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Improve the build setup a little #1672

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Finish System.CommandLine updates and ports #22312
    6.0.2xx
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 Missing error message when dotnet test can't find older, targeted framework #22311
  • [ARM32]With .NET 5 SDK installed, running application failed with error required library libhostfxr.so could not be found. #22304
  • Document How to Enable Hot Reloading Using dotnet run/watch #22303

Closed

  • [Source Build] Remove System.Text.Encoding.CodePages prebuilt #4260
    3.0.1xx
  • dotnet publish with a runtime identifier and no build publish the wrong version of System.Net.Http dll #3683
    3.0.1xx
  • Fail to setup 5.0.403 arm64 SDK(November update) on win-arm64 with error this product not support on arm64 #22261
  • Build fails on ARM64 Linux, likely because of issue with workload SDK resolver #22221
  • Cannot run published executable on Apple M1 architecture #21123
  • [Known Issue] Installing VS2022 Preview 5.0 and/or .NET 6.0 RC2 results in x86 dotnet on the PATH #22047
  • After .NET 6.0 RTM arm64 SDK installed, "dotnet run" failed with error "A fatal error occurred..." when open 3.1/5.0 project. #22127
  • CLI help is misleading in placement of options and gives confusing error #22302
  • Update CLI to stop using obsolete System.CommandLine APIs #18952
    7.0.1xx
  • Fix duplicate AnalysisLevel_*.editorconfig files packaged inside the .NET SDK #22051

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to attempt to resolve tool install issues in tests #22315
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add implicit RIDs when not specified on self contained option #22314
    Area-CLI
  • Fix usage of IndexOf that didn't respect current culture #22313
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • remove duplicate config files from sdk layout #22087
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Relax rules for trailing whitespaces in format specifier #3414
    Likely Never

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Delegate Type Arguments Improvements #5321
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion "Allow no-arg constructor and field initializers in struct declarations" #99
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Working Set
  • Support for method parameter names in nameof() #373
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Event hookup in object initializer #5176

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Generate Equals and GetHasCode" Throws Exception #57361
  • Code Style IDE0007 and IDE0008 ('var' preferences) should default to preferring var over explicit type for .Net Core 3.1 and .Net 5.0 #57359
  • Unexpected behavior when compiling a project with an error from the roslyn analyzer #57357
  • Provide API access to MS.CA.Rebuild functionality #57356

Closed

  • Extract method fails on top-level programs #56969
    17.1
  • "Introduce Local" refactoring hard-coded to use CRLF #47382
    Backlog
  • C#: 'Introduce local' refactoring causes CS8602 warning. #57360
  • Regression: String.IsNullOrEmpty does not resolve nullable IDE/compiler warning #57348

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57374
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57371
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • snap 17.1p1 #57367
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use correct line endings when sorting imports #57365
    Area-IDE
  • Unskip BasicGenerateConstructorDialog.VerifyDeselect #57364
    Area-IDE
  • Unskip BasicGenerateConstructorDialog.VerifyReordering #57363
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.1.P1
  • Fix 'AssemblyVersion overridden by auto-generated version' warning in build #57338
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.1.P1
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1

Updated

  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Fix race in document change tracker when used in non-mutating requests. #57317
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Add diags to help us diagnose lightbulb issues better #57312
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add feature flag to enable LSP classifications in local scenarios #57291
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Have tagger wait on the OOP host having a complete compilation rather than waiting for the local host to have it. #57290
    Area-IDE
  • DecisionDagBuilder.CheckConsistentDecision - Improve relationship check for tests under examination. #57345
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update TextSpan.cs #57300
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload doesn't detect (rude) edit when adding new `builder.service.AddHttpClient` #37833
  • Incorrect self-closing script tag leads to poor error experience #37832
  • IIS Express Claims to support trailers on Win10 #37831
  • [Blazor] Lazy loading library initializtion #37829
  • Regression in Blazor build performance with 7.0 SDK #37827
  • Address .NET 6 Razor build performance regressions #37826
  • "An item with the same key has already been added." in Blazor Webasm #37825
  • SignalR client timeout on StartAsync behaves differently across platforms and does not appear to be configurable #37824
  • Load BlazorWebView HostPage from embedded resource #37823
  • Multi tag helper create multi value of __tagHelperExecutionContext #37822
  • Incorrect groupIdentity/Identity for protobuf item template. #37815
    6.0.x
  • Blazor Server app not terminating circuit as expected when an exception is rethrown in an event handler #37814
  • Blazor wasm custom identity #37813
  • "Lite" Version of Web Forms in .NET 6 #37812
  • QUESTION: Is it possible to create a query parameter name transformer for blazor? #37811
    Backlog
  • Allow customized implementations of `IRequestCultureprovider` to be directly injected into the middleware #37806
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #37805
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #37804
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #37803

Closed

  • Replat Razor design time builds on to source generators #31168
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration` warnings in new project in ASP.NET Core 6.0 RC2 #37744
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ClientTimesoutWhenHandshakeResponseTakesTooLong test failure #35728
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Flaky test: IHttpActivityFeatureIsNotPopulatedWithoutAListener #34072
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `IDistributedCache` for set/list/hash #37697
  • Mock System Clock for FileLoggerProcessor Tests #34807
    7.0-preview1
  • Question: Does RCL support changing wwwroot path? #37775
  • Hot-Reload in VS very slow; but very fast with dotnet watch #37773
  • QUESTION: CustomModelBinder does not work on properties of the Dto/ViewModel #37774
  • Errors with an on-premise connection (with .Net Core 3.1 on Docker) #37810
  • Browserlink causes "TypeLoadException" for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.IHttpSendFileFeature' after RC2 #37747
  • BlazorWasm net6rc2 can't debug #37801

PullRequests

Created

  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37834
  • Re-quarantine IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated #37830
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37819
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37818
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37816
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Removed outdated sections #37798
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantined IHttpActivity tests #37821
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine ClientTimesoutWhenHandshakeResponseTakesTooLong #37820
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "Update to stable Roslyn versions (#37663) (#37764)" #37817
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `64a6ddc` to `a575301` #37807
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • 34411 HTTP/2 and HTTP/3: Response trailers collection not reset #37627
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure
  • Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37781
    area-signalr
  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • documentation/sos-debugging-extension.md contains bad link to lldasm #2311

Updated

  • Necessary permissions in docker using a rootless user for dotnet-* tools #2102

    7.0.0

    Future

    7.0.0
  • clru command in lldb fails to work #1907
    Future
  • SOS DumpLog crashing lldb #1837
    Future

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Update sos-debugging-extension.md #2704

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] ScrollView doesn't center a child if the child has Shadow defined #3106
  • [Bug] iOS device test visual runner CollectionView crash #3104
  • [Bug] Unexpected behavior when InvalidateMeasure is invoked in Android #3102
  • Clean up the namespaces #3101
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] Simple arithmetic operations taken too much in maui platform #3100
  • [Bug] Workload ID maui is not recognized - Unable to find even a single workload #3099

Closed

  • [Bug] iOS Placeholder displays on top of Editor #2922
  • [Bug] Test FontAutoScalingEnabled once spans are implemented #1793
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Rework SetVirtualView so when called via the interface it won't call the abstract SetVirtualView #1213
  • [Bug] Provide hook on WinUI Gestures for users to set PreventGestureBubbling #1572

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix mappers so if they are accessed early on it doesn't effect the remapping #3109
  • Ensure measure is invalidated when AbsoluteLayout bounds are updated #3108
  • [core] do not configure loggers by default on mobile #3107

Merged

  • Fix placeholder on iOS Editor so it doesn't overlap when text is present when text is set in code #3086
    area/controls 🎮
  • [build] Add maui-blazor to vs-workload.props #3105
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/setup 🪄

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Android] CollectionView handler for android #3067
    do-not-merge, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [WinUI] Implement SearchBar IsTextPredictionEnabled property #2911
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there an out of the box functionality to traverse a graph of tracked entities? #26461
  • Is support for temporal tables for TPT (Table per Types) planned in the future and if so, when? #26457
  • Self-referencing relationship breaks in `6.0.0-rc.2.21480.5` #26456
  • [Bug] Migrations "Could not drop constraint." exception after earlier foreign key exception during "Update-Database" #26453
  • How to setup a reviewing migration (and rollback) gate for scripts in Azure DevOps? #26452
  • Temporal Table: Owned Entities support? #26451

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.1] Register design-time LoggerFactory as Scoped #26460
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Evolve null-checking approach #26459
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.0 #26458
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • No skipped tests in non-functional tests #26450

Updated

  • Check and update service lifetime docs #26445
  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-110743-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #12112

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove 2.1 templates from dynamic templates #12511
  • Revert roslyn patch changes. #12509

Merged

  • [release/3.1.4xx] Only block installing x64 SDK on ARM64 #12510
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0.2xx] Backport x64 on ARM64 installer changes #12494
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0.4xx] Permit installation of 5.0 ARM64 SDK #12508
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0.1xx] [ArPow] Delete optional files under non-open source licenses #12507
  • Add patch to build net472 in NuGet to support Omnisharp. #12501
  • Fix roslyn to build with boostrapped build #12500

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12371
